channel.title: Blog on Everyone Has a Story
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Everyone Has a Story

item.title: Finally HTTPS
item.description: Well, GitHub started providing HTTPS for the even custom domain, So I had to enable that plus there were some internal changes which were required. Which I had done. Its been almost two years since I have bought this domain But I have been away from blogging. I had setup this a good time ago using Hugo and a cactus theme still have been struck the same place not able to write what I want or I should say not able to give to write what I want.

item.title: First Post
item.description: So finally blog is up again I have thinking to making this up long time and finally I have yay. Well I did purchase the domain in last august, I am using hugo static site generator and currently I am using customized version of cocoa-eh theme. What I like about this theme is its very simple, plain, I dont like more fancy stuff and I could customize it as per requirement.
